purposeDescriptions.low: pulls a thin stream of fluid along the Path
purposeDescriptions.mid: sends a stream of fluid down the Path
purposeDescriptions.high: launches a column of fluid down the Path
purposeDescriptions.invLow: pulls a thin stream of a distant fluid towards the caster along the Path
purposeDescriptions.invMid: drags a stream of a distant fluid towards the caster along the Path
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: blasts the caster with some distant fluid, sending it up the Path
